modName: ReAL Fire - insane0h HD fire texture replacement
summary: a much higher resolution fire enhancement - still a WIP
descriptionHtml:
A much needed higher fire texture enhancement mod.

will be updated the smoke effects, the fire effects, and the ember effects - such as black smith smelter, etc.

Installation:
Simply extract to your skyrim\data folder

Unistallation
delete the following files
data/effects\fxembers.dds
data\effects\smokeparticles01.dds
data\effects\woodburning.dds
data\effects\grad\gradflame01.dds
author: sval
